body:
Thanks for the review, I've unassigned you, and will remove the unneeded parts you pointed out.

@gijsk can you review the rest of the code? Most of it should be pretty straight forward. I'm also working with PI to do manual QA of this feature, to make sure it matches the spec laid out in the docs.
